```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## First exploratory data 
```{r}

```

```{r Chris analysis}
personen <- read_delim(file = "data/protected_data/personen.csv", col_names = TRUE)
head(personen)

anteile <- personen %>% 
  group_by(geschlecht) %>% 
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  mutate(anteil = n / sum(n))

ggplot(anteile, aes(x = geschlecht, y = anteil)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
```
